question_variants: When is the Makkah Halal Forum?

answer.direct: Makkah Halal Forum (Third Edition) runs from 14 to 16 February 2026 (26-28 Shaaban 1447) at the Makkah Chamber Exhibition & Convention Center, under the patronage of H.E. Dr. Majid bin Abdullah Al-Qasabi, Minister of Commerce.
steps: Day 1: Saturday 14 February – High-Level Conference, Exhibition, B2B, Cooking Show, Roundtable
Day 2: Sunday 15 February – Conference, Masterclass, Exhibition, MoU Signing, Opening Ceremony
Day 3: Monday 16 February – Exhibition, B2B, Women Empowerment Track, HalalPreneurship Track, Halal Echo
mistakes: Confusing Gregorian dates with Hijri dates
Arriving after registration closes at 2:00 PM

answer.direct: The forum venue is the Makkah Chamber Exhibition & Convention Center.

Check hall and theatre labels on arrival
Follow signage to registration first at the Main Exhibition Hall

Skipping check-in before sessions

steps: Register at the Main Exhibition Hall from 1:30 PM

answer.direct: The Halal Cooking Show runs all 3 days from 3:00 PM to 9:00 PM at the Main Exhibition Hall. It features live culinary demonstrations highlighting the creativity and global versatility of halal ingredients, reimagining international cuisines through halal-compliant innovation.

answer.direct: The Halal Experts Corner offers dedicated one-on-one advisory sessions with leading halal compliance, certification, and industry specialists. It requires reservation in advance. Available Day 1 (2:00-10:00 PM) and Day 2 (3:00-7:00 PM) at the Main Exhibition Hall.
